thread.title: Stolen vehicles recovered and drug suspect arrested in Ekurhuleni | Kempton Express
thread.title_full: Stolen vehicles recovered and drug suspect arrested in Ekurhuleni | Kempton Express

author: Print Content
title: Stolen vehicles recovered and drug suspect arrested in Ekurhuleni | Kempton Express
text:
Between June 30 and July 5, members of the Benoni Flying Squad arrested one suspect and recovered a motor vehicle and a motorcycle.
Officers found an abandoned, stripped Big Boy motorcycle at Water Crescent, Mapleton Ext 10. The motorcycle was reported stolen in a case from Bramley.
A red Mazda 323 was also recovered along Gumede Street, Daveyton. This vehicle was reported stolen in a Middelburg case.
In further police action, a 25-year-old suspect was arrested on July 1 in Station Road, Brakpan, with Mandrax recovered in his possession.
Investigations are ongoing in these cases. The suspect appeared in the Brakpan Magistrateâ€™s Court, facing charges of possession of drugs.
topics: Crime, Law and Justice->drug related crimes
